name: Clearbit Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Clearbit Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Clearbit API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Clearbit API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: company
available_options: Company (值: company) - The Company API allows you to look up a company by their domain
Person (值: person) - The Person API lets you retrieve social information associated with an email address, such as a person’s name, location and Twitter handle

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: enrich
available_options: Enrich (值: enrich) - Look up a person and company data based on an email or domain

domain.name: domain
domain.natural_language_description: 参数名: Domain | 作用: The domain to look up | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: company (值: None) - The name of the person’s employer
companyDomain (值: None) - The domain for the person’s employer
facebook (值: None) - The Facebook URL for the person
familyName (值: None) - Last name of person. If you have this, passing this is strongly recommended to improve match rates.
givenName (值: None) - First name of person
ipAddress (值: None) - IP address of the person. If you have this, passing this is strongly recommended to improve match rates.
location (值: None) - The city or country where the person resides
linkedIn (值: None) - The LinkedIn URL for the person
twitter (值: None) - The Twitter handle for the person

name.name: name
name.description: Name is the partial name of the company
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name is the partial name of the company | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.description: The email address to look up
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The email address to look up | (必填项)
